sql.if: where is_notice = 0 and title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where is_notice = 0 and content like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where is_notice = 0 and title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

mapper.select: select * from notice where is_notice = 1 order by notice_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into notice(content, title, is_notice, member_code, writer) values (#{content}, #{title}, #{isNotice}, #{memberCode}, #{writer})
insert into notice_attach(notice_filename, notice_no) values (#{fullname}, LAST_INSERT_ID())
mapper.delete: delete from notice_attach where notice_no = #{no} and notice_filename = #{fullname}
